name: Underwater World
description:
This is an adventure game that requires testing your eyesight and skills.
Players click the left mouse button to attack, and the directional keys move. The blue ocean is full of magic and beauty. In the game, players need to control the mermaids in the deep sea to bravely face danger and cross the dangerous sea. There may be ocean monsters attacking from all directions, but the brave mermaids will cleverly use their weapons to eliminate them. Come and give it a try!
